text: The River Clyde (, ) is a river in Scotland. It flows through Glasgow before opening up into the Firth of Clyde. ==References== == Other websites == * River Clyde: Source to Firth Panorama Project * The Clyde-built ships data base - lists over 22,000 ships built on the Clyde * Clyde Waterfront regeneration * Clyde Waterfront Heritage * Glasgow Digital Library: Glimpses of old Glasgow * In Glasgow Photo Gallery of pictures of the River Clyde * Clydebank Restoration Trust Category:Rivers of Scotland Category:Geography of Glasgow
title: River Clyde
